segments.text: When do you usually go to the movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually go in my free time on the weekends . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The movie theater is always so crowded on the weekends . I like to go to the movies during the week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . And sometimes the tickets are cheaper during the week as well .
segments.speaker: S2
